title: What is Next.js?
answer: Next.js is a React framework for building server-side rendered (SSR) web applications.

title: What is the difference between Next.js and Create React App?
answer: Next.js provides server-side rendering (SSR) out of the box, while Create React App is client-side only. Next.js also provides a file-based routing system and other features such as automatic code splitting, pre-fetching, and more.
